78b7(mdo): mang po 'do da nga gur rtse zhing longs spyod do// rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khrim tho khyad kyi tshad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyand pa/ lA rdzas kyi na
78b8(mdo): bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal par bkram pa'i khri de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar mye'i 'od dkyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs
79a1(mdo): la/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad myed pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du ma dar / thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la'o/ so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol te/ 
79a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyuci'i rkyen kyis/ 'od bzang mo// kha dag sngon po dang / ther po dang dmang po dang / kar po dang bcas 'ang ldan par btu gsal ba dbe myi bzong ba 'di shar phyogs nas 'khamam po 'di dus
79a3(mdo): la snang bar gyur da te/ gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan tu gsol da/ de la bcom ldan 'das des
79a4(mdo): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag le gas par nyon la/ shi nad tu yid la legs par zung shig dang / khyed la grol bar bshad par bya'o// 'di nas shar phyogs log
79a5(mdo): 'jig rtend kyis khams tshad myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa zhes bya ba
79a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
79a7(mdo): bla na myed pa stonod pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba/ 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad la mkhas pa chen zas drin lan bsam pa'i ma do ba
79a8(mdo): stond cing ngo / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsa nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma'i byang chub sgrims dpa' dag byang chub
79b1(mdo): las phyir gyi ldog cing / brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyinang pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshon gyi rnams myu gyi mtsham
79b2(mdo): par byang chub cing / sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsapa pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho lus rnam pa'i phyir/ 
79b3(mdo): so so'i dag pa ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no// de'i 'khor de'i napan byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang stond par 'gyur ba/ stong phrag bcu
79b4(mdo): snyed stan las langs te/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lA rnaMs sa btsugs te/ bcom na 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
79b5(mdo): kyi byin kyis brlabs kyis bdag cag rnams kyi myi ma// jed gi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / der bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang
79b6(mdo): thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka
79b7(mdo): stsalang ngo to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed myi mjed kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams der phyind nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mnod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes
79b8(mdo): bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs skye ba bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu skyed dka' dar spyad de// snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab zo
80a1(mdo): gal te mngon pa sangs rgyas par/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can/ radang shang gong dang / rgya ma dang gshegs dang mas la stsogs pa yod pa'i gnas su/ sems can dag kyang cad
80a2(mdo): mongs pa dang bcas pa/ mtshams myed pa lnga dang / myi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas des mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba 'i don tu sdug la thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thos
80a3(mdo): cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur da cig ces smon lam btab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces
80a4(mdo): smon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyi nad nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang / 'dra bar gnas par
80a5(mdo): bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dang 'di dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun par/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems
80a6(mdo): de dag me re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ myi mjed kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang dngan pa der song ngo // de dag 'jig rtend gyi khams gang
80a7(mdo): dang gang du phyind par/ 'jig rtend kyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bam gyur da/ steng gi bar snang las lnga rnams kyis mye tog man bA ra ba dang / man dAr ba chen
80a8(mdo): ba la char bzhin pa'i 'o// 'ad zer chen pos snang bar byas shing tu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i DU kyi bya ste dag kyang gams so// de ma yin pa gzhan ya pa lba rdzas kyi rol ma ched byed
80b1(mdo): pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bam zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpal de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i rig la ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lpags nas// zhabs la man
80b2(mdo): bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum skor ba byas da/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas/ kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i lo zer gyis byang phyogs
80b3(mdo): logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig lnga brgya 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rtend kyi khams dbang phyug grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba snang bar byas so// 'jig rtend kyi khams de na sangs rgyas
80b4(mdo): pad mo leb rgan gyi 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten da mkhyen ma/ skyes bu 'dul
80b5(mdo): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa stond pa rgyal ba sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnya/ 
80b6(mdo): zhing gzhi po dUr+ya las byas pa gsor tshoms thig le'u bris pa rin ma che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mngal rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ mye tog dang 'bras bu dang yal ka dang 'dab mas
80b7(mdo): shind tu brgya nad pa rlung myi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de dag kyang yang so so'i skye bos thos pas myi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu myig dang mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/ 
80b8(mdo): yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing / rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin gsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i mye tog dang pad ma dang pun d+ha ri ka dang / pa ri shi ka
81a1(mdo): du'ang stan pa 'byid to// rdza 'di rin pol lnga brgyan las byas pam su yod te/ den sems can mang ba 'dod dgung kyi ning bangs su dang // rnam tha' ma zhing de dag gi bar ba na/ 
81a2(mdo): ge'i kyis byu na na pa yan mams bdun gyis brnyan // spangs kyin las khyi ma ti / sa kyi dri yul mamardzas kyi ma rtag gis
81a3(mdo): bkram pa'i khwa'i zag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo sa brgan kyi 'dachags pa/ rgyas mi thu du bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ h+ya ni bachub sems dpa' chang byed pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun
81a4(mdo): du bdar te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// 4com ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyend kyis/ 'od brna
81a5(mdo): kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / kang po ldan pa/ rab tu gsal ba gaper mi bzod pa 'di/ lho phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur da te/ gang la/ 
81a6(mdo): 'od kyis rig pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstanang du gsol/ dril bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' bulang
81a7(mdo): to// rigs kyi bu dag legs pa ma nyan la shin du mi la migs par zung shig dang / byings dag ma zhing can par gyi'o// 'dzinas lags sogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag zhi
81b1(mdo): brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed ces bya ba yod te/ de na sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa shes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
81b2(mdo): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha la sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa stonod pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba 'a
81b3(mdo): mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor mang po mas mkhas pa chen pos drin lan bsab pa'i mdo'i sde stond cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams
81b4(mdo): cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsa nas gdon pa'i phyir/ sems tho ga ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub las phyir myi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
81b5(mdo): thams cad mthar phyind pa'i theg pa gcig la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing / ngas rgyas kyi drin lan bsam pa'i phyir/ sems can thams
81b6(mdo): cad kyi drin lci 'a dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol pa phyir/ sa so'i skye za dag pha ma la sri zhu bya 'ang 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'od 'di snang bar gyur da ba yin no// de'i
81b7(mdo): 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i rtse bo dang / stond par gyur da pa/ stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs par gyur da nas/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas
81b8(mdo): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin kyis rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams myi mjed kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin
82a1(mdo): gshegs bshag kya thub pa la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen pos sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan mchi bar byin kyis brlab tu gsol// 
82a2(mdo): de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed myi mjed kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams der phyi nang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la/ mchod cing
82a3(mdo): bkur sti bya ba dang / shind tu phrad ka ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ni skald pa grangs myed pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du/ shin tu spyod dka' ba spyad pas snying
82a4(mdo): rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te mdo na bar sangs rgyas pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang sha dang shor dang / gyo ma dpag seg ma dang tsher ma la stsogs pa'i yod pa'i
82a5(mdo): gnas su// sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang brtsa/ sa pa/ mtshams myed pa lnga dang / myi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyad pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i
82a6(mdo): don tu sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur da cig ces smon lam btab na
82a7(mdo): sangs rgyas des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin pa nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dnga'
82a8(mdo): byar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal dpag/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re la
82b1(mdo): thab snang ba rgyas shing chu 'acus kyis 'jig tan gyi nyams grang ga'i slang kyi gyis byung bya mas // de ma yin pa gzhan yul rdza sa kyang sa mtha byung bzang kyang / bang gi ba slang la ma
82b2(mdo): ba bzhin tu/ thamams dpa'ad danas na sungs pa'i rig la ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i stan lhags nas/ zhabs la 'an zas phyag 'tshal te/ sa
82b3(mdo): nag su tu ma dang // na thamams bzhi pa/ dang na / phyogs sums lhags pa'i rgya dum bams da
82b4(mdo): gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong snyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la yongs su byed do// de snyam sangs rgyas la bstod nas kyang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe myi mjed kyi 'jig rten da gi khams
82b5(mdo): kyang yongs su dag par gyur da te/ mi khrang khrod dpa'i chen po dedab chu dru dang / rtsang po dang chu rlung dang / mche lu dang / rdzing dang lteng ka drang/ shang shong dang / ngas grog dag myed cing / de na gnas pa'i sems
83a1(mdo): can nams kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ sangs rgyas gapan pa der lpags te/ dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis thal mo spyang btud nas/ mag zas phyog 'tshal te/ myig myi mdzums pa
83a2(mdo): chags pa'i yid kyis lta zhing 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gzer phyir 'dus par mdzad te/ 'od gzer de dag gis sku la lan bdun bskor nas dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de ltar
83a3(mdo): gyur da pa kun dga' bos mtho nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad kyang the tsom du gyur par sems kyis rab tu shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams mkhas pa mngon par snyand pa dang / phyis la
83a4(mdo): 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag gis shes rab kyi myig dbe' ba dang / so'i skye bo thams cad sred pa'i chu rlung las rgal zhing pha rol tu phyind pas bde ba la bkod pa dang / so so'i skye bo dag pa ma hA
83a5(mdo): slob dpon dang bla ma'i drin lci ba dran zhing shes par bya ba'i phyir/ stan las langs nas gos chags bcos nas bla gos phyogs cig tu bya sa te/ pus mo sa la btsugs nas/ thal mo spyad pa btun
83a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zha 'bring na mchi nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste 'di la nges par dgongs pa ni mnga' na/ 'khor
83a7(mdo): mang po 'i com kyi dra ba bcad pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol/ thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lanabs pa pa'i mdo' las/ gleng gzhi
83a8(mdo): le'u zhes bya ste gcig go// / de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po 'dus pa de/ rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i pad ma'i sdong po dngul las byas/ 'dab ma ni gser las byas/ gzhi ni drin
83b1(mdo): po tshe shel las byas pa/ mu tig dri bas kun tu brgya nad pa gtsigs de nyid nas byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas/ pad mo de la skyil mo gru ba bcas
83b2(mdo): nas bzhugs so// de la bzhugs ma thag tu yongs su dag pa'i sku mngon par stond to// sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tsho gas bstan/ lus kyi tsho gas de re re la yang gzugs tha dad pa rnam pa re re la yang sku
83b3(mdo): tshogs brgya stong snyed bstanang sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tsho gas bstan to// gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang / gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi
83b4(mdo): rdul snyed kyi sku'i tsho gas bstand/ gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi sku'i cho gas de dag re re la yang / stong gsum gyi sto pAm+bo'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sku'i cho gas bstan to// stong
83b5(mdo): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sku'i tsho gas de dag re re la yang / phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re yang rang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
83b6(mdo): gi rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tsho gas bstand nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa snyed kyi sems cad kyi lus kyi tsho gas mngon par bstan do// de'i tshe de bzhin
83b7(mdo): gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstand nas kun dga' bo dang phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di
83b8(mdo): skad ces bka' stsal // rigs kyi bu dag deng de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i tshig gang yin pa de bka' stsal par bya'o// chos la tshig tu brjod pa myed mod kyi
84a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkhas pa'i dab pa zhis mtshan pa dang myi byung ba'i chos la mying mtshan mar bstand par bya'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa ni thog me skyo shing 'khor bar mam
84a2(mdo): ba'i tshe/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam par tha dad pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par myong ste/ de ltar lus kyi tsho gas de dag kun myong bas na sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs
84a3(mdo): pa'i pha mar ma gyur pa myed/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can gyi pha mar ma gyur pa myed de/ pha mar gyur pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyu nad tu shi nad tu spyad dka' ba yang spyad/ shin tu gtang dka' ba yan lag
84a4(mdo): gi dam pa mgo dang / myig dang glang rgyas dang / yul da dgrongs khyer dang chung ma dang bu bo dang / ban glang dang rta dang / rin po/ sna bdun gyi shing rta dang / theg pa dang gos dang / zas dang skom dang
84a5(mdo): mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyend kyi rtsi dang / dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad la gang yang ma btang ba byed do// shin tu 'bar ba'i 'artse na 'grus kyis tshul khrims srung ba dang / sbyin pa byas pa dang / mang du
84a6(mdo): zos pa dang / bsam gtan bsgoms pa dang / shes rab spyod pa nas/ spyod dka' ba thams cad sa/ skyo ba dngangal ba byed/ cing rgyun myi 'chad par brtson 'grus su 'bad pa yang / pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang
84a7(mdo): drin shes pa dang / drin lan bsapa pa dang / sems can thams cad sgyum du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
84a8(mdo): de lta na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka 'din chen po yod pa bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen thos sems can yongs su kyi gtong ba dang / rtag par gnad du thabs mkhas pas
84b1(mdo): khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la/ bskal pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i bar du mnyam snyoms pa'i byams pa bsgoms shing btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i thabs mkhas
84b2(mdo): spyod de/ sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / chos stong pa nyid dang / phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtogs shing phyir myi nud pa dang / myi 'bying ba dang / myi rgod pa stong pa nyid du yang dag pa mtshan
84b3(mdo): nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum gyi spo bzhing chub par slob pa'i thabs la mkhas pas shin tu zab mo'i spyod yul dag pa spyad pa thabs mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi mtshan nyid
84b4(mdo): la shin tu gsal bar rtogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam sa thog ma dang tha ma'i bdu gcig ma yin par rtogs shing chud kyang / sa sa'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslad pas gdung ba gsum gyis yongs su
84b5(mdo): gdungs te sdug bsngal gsum gi mchorang nub par gyur na/ to// phyin da ci log bzhi'i sa bsgribs pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la phyind mi log su gyur to// myi bden par kun du rtogs pan
84b6(mdo): bdag myed pa la bdag tu lta/ myi rtag pa la rtag par lta// myi bde ba la bde bar lta/ myi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing / skye ba dang rga ba dang / na ba dang mchi bas gzi da te/ skad cig skad cig myi rtog
84b7(mdo): bas sgrib pa lnga dang / kun nas klags pa bcus kun tu grags te/ srid pa gsum tu 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang tha ma myed pa khyod ba 'gyur da to// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang ci phrod pa bzhin sde snod
84b8(mdo): gsum dang / mdo sde rgu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye zhing bstand te/ so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang po gsungs so// tshig la chags pa kha cig dag ni 'di kho nas chog ste/ mya ngan
85a1(mdo): las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa yang yod te/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen za'i smon lam shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend kyi khams na las mthun pa thams cad
85a2(mdo): bsdus so// de ltar las mthun pa kun 'dus pas/ 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dam pa'i mdo lnga gsungs par dgongs te gzugs rnyan gyi nom du yang rgyun myi 'chad cing / so so'i skye zos thams cad
85a3(mdo): bde ba chen po thob par mdzad do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul shing stond pa yang dus las myi yol par gshegs/ dus las phyi yol bar mya tanams 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu
85a4(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad zhes bya ba/ dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
85a5(mdo): 'ilas sgyur ba/ tham byed pa gan pa rgyal ba sangs rgyam ma ldan 'das shes grags so// skabs khacig du ni dga' ldan gyin sa su gshegs nas sa rnams kyi dad pa mdzad // 
85a6(mdo): kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs te/ 'jam bu gli du sku che brgya bzhugs par yang stom no// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// 'jig rtend gyi khams kyang bsam kyis kyi kha
85a7(mdo): ze/ mas kyi rnam par sbyind pa yang 'amam gyis kyi khyab bo// sems can bsam gyis myi khyab bo// bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// klu'i mthu yang bsas kyis kyi khyab bo/ 'dzigs
85a8(mdo): 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi thams kyis kyi khyam pa na/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na/ sems cad dbang bzhan dpa tha ma 'i tham sus bkun gas sa ma mdzad // 
85b1(mdo): can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod na/ de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do// gal te mthong bar myi mdzad na/ myig sngar bab kyang myi mthong ngo // de bas mnyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag lnga'i myig gi
85b2(mdo): mngan par shes pa yod kyang mthong bar gyi nus so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis 'od zem chen po bskyed nas/ sring ba'i rtsim mtshang sa rnams myed pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang / nga
85b3(mdo): 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pas ni mthong bar gyur pa/ gang 'dul ba dang myi ldan pas ni byig sdor ba' kyang myi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs skabs kha cig du ni cheng du bskul bar mdzad/ skabs kha cig du ni cang byi gsung
85b4(mdo): bas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste// shin tu blta bar dka' ba/ shinang tu shes shing rtogs par dka' na/ ji ltar khyod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la spyod dka' ba shin
85b5(mdo): tu bzab mo dri ba la spobs par 'gyur// khyod kyis zhus pa 'di ni yang dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba yin te/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam bkag nas/ lha dang myi'i lam
85b6(mdo): gtod pa yin no// kun dga' bo ngas nga khyod la pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i spyod dka' ba mdol tsam zhig bstand par byas legs par nyon la yid la zung shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang / byang
85b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// sngon byung ba bskal pa tshad myed pa mtha' yas grangs myed pa'i 'das pa'i pha rol dan/ yul ba man ser/ 
85b8(mdo): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dpa zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba
86a1(mdo): kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa stond pa rgyal ba/ 'jig rten kyi gtso bo/ lha dang myi'i stond pa 'jig rtenang du byung ngo // sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang skal da pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhugs so// dam pa'i
86a2(mdo): dam chos kyang skal da pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so// gzugs rnyan kyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so// gzugs rnyan la chos byed pa'i tshe myi'i rgyal po ra tsa zhes bya ba 'jig rtenang du byung ste/ yul be na sel
86a3(mdo): dbang sgyur ro// rgyal po de la btsun mo nyi khri yod de/ blon po ni bzhi stong snyed yod/ bal gi glang po che yang lnga brgya yod/ rgyal phran drug bcu la dbang ba/ grong khyer brgyad rgya zhig yod do// rgyal po de la rgyal bu gsu
86a4(mdo): yod te gsum char yang rgyal phran re re la dbang byed de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yul ba ran se'i rgyal po de mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan te/ rtag tu yang dag pa'i chos kyi yul gyi srid 'dzind pas/ gang yang stobs
86a5(mdo): las chad ces bya ba myed do// rgyal po de'i bsod nams dang yon tan gyi mthus/ tsha bcu dus las myi yol te lo tog rgyu nad tu leg sa pas de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang bde sbyir do// de'i chen pa
86a6(mdo): man po'i rgyal po ral/ thun ma tshan po gan chen sna can ces bya ba zhig yod de/ blon po lnga gcan rgyal po la mkhrus nas dpag nam bzhi 'ashams pa la 'di lta ste/ ban glang gi sogs dang / shing rta 'i tshogs dang da'i tshig
86a7(mdo): dang / dpung gu chu gi tshogs pa shams nas/ bar se'i rgyal po la bkal nas/ rgyal po'i srog bcad do// de ltar rgyal po laso napas kyang dpag gi sogs rnam bzhi bkyenas mtha'i rgyal phran chung ba kyang bam
86a8(mdo): de nas rgyal bu 'bring po yang phab nas/ mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu bachungs kyi thog tu dmag drang bang bshams so// rgyal bu bachungs de ngo mchar du gzugs byad bzang la 'phags par mdzes shing / rang bzhin gyis dge 'dul
86b1(mdo): da pa / pa kyi 'dres/ @ kyang bar byung ba dngas yang byung da na
86b2(mdo): po cher ldan pa/ bang mdzod gang ba/ rgyal ba de'i yon tan la kun gyis sngags shing / stong pa bar snang gi lha dang 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis kyang dgal zhing bkur ba/ de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu mu sha ras
86b3(mdo): zhes pa gcig pu zhig yod de/ shin tu yid gzhungs shing gsal ba/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba la/ lus kyi mdog gser tu 'dug pa/ gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba/ skyes bu'i mtshan
86b4(mdo): rdzogs par ldan pa/ lo bdun lon pa cig yod pa de la/ pa rgyal po yang shin tu byams shing sdug par rgyun tu sems so// de'i chen pho brang srung ba'i lha zhig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal
86b5(mdo): pos mkhyend tam/ blon po sgra gcan 'khus nas yul gyi sra daphrogs te/ rgyal po yab kyang bkrongs/ dmag gi tshogs pa zhi yang bkye nas rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang srog gi dbang po dang bral
86b6(mdo): te/ dmag gi tshogs rnams ring po myi thogs par 'dir phyin na/ rgyal po ci'i phyir srog skyabs shing gud du myi 'gro// de'i tshe rgyal po des de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ lus kyi ba spu kun zing zhes byed de/ lus
86b7(mdo): kyang 'das nang yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te/ sa la 'gre zhing brgyal bar gyur da nas/ ring po zhig lon pa dang / chung zad sangs te dal gyis nam ka'i lA la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di skad smra ba skad ni
86b8(mdo): yod la gzugs ni gyi snang ba khyed mi yin/ smras pa'i tshig 'di yang bdag par bden nas/ lhas smras pa bdag ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te/ rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing / bsod nams dang yon tan
87a1(mdo): tu bcas sam/ drang po'i chos kyis yul srid 'dzin ce/ de bas na bdag gis sngar sman pa yin nyan rabs na sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs papa' gyur dpar myur du byol zhing bros pa'i rigs so// mengs
87a2(mdo): rgyal po de pho brang du zhugs nas/ da ni bdag yul gzhan zhig du 'gro dgos so bsams nas/ yang 'di snyam du bsams so// yul pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod de/ lam nye bar zhugs na ni zhag
87a3(mdo): bdun gyis yul pha rol du phyind par 'gyur/ lam ring por zhugs na ni zhag bcu bzhis phyi nang par 'gyur bas/ ci nas lam nye bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas/ zhag bdun gyi rgyags dang chas te/ pho brang gi phyi
87a4(mdo): rol tu phyind pa dang / byir pho brang gi nang du log nas rgyal bu su sha de par du blangs te/ myig myi mdzums par lta zhing / spangs pa da ltar langs nas phyir yang khyim na 'dug go// de'i tshe btsun mas
87a5(mdo): de ltar myi bde zhing skrag pa ltam gyur dam mtha nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po chen po ro ltar ci'i slad du 'jigs skrag pa lta bu'i gzugs stond cing / sku la yang rdul gyis gos
87a6(mdo): ma wA ba ra ni \u0f88\u0f90 yang 'dzings te/ dbugs kyang dmyi bde ste yul stor la thug pa 'am/ mdza' sdug pa dbye ba 'am/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa lta bu dang / bkra myi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' ba 'di ci lags
87a7(mdo): bstan du gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ kho bo ci nyes pa khyed shes pa ma yin gyis ma sma cig/ btsun mos gsol pa/ bdag kyang rgyal po lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste/ dpe
87a8(mdo): bya'i 'dab ma gnyis sam lus rkang pa gnyis sam/ mgo'i dmyig gnyis dang 'dran ci'i slad du bdag la/ gdas ste myi gsung / rgyal pos btsun mo la smras pa/ khyed myi shes pas ma blon po sgra can ngan sos
87b1(mdo): skyes nas rgyal po la 'khus te/ yab rgyal po yang bkros/ gcon rgyal bu gnyis kyang srog gi ba car byas te da ltar dmag drang chas te nga la dgol du 'ong bas kho bo yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes smras nas
87b2(mdo): rgyal bu dge don par du blangs te lam tu zhugs so// de nas btsun mo yang rgyal po'i phyir 'brangs ste song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis nond te yid 'khrugs nas/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam tu zhugs pas lam
87b3(mdo): yang nor te/ lam de yang dgrod dka' zhing sa yang rtsub/ rtsa chu tsam yang myed de/ zhag du ma zhig song ba las rgyags kyang tshad do// thog ma ga sangs te rgyal po gcig pu 'gro bar byas nas/ zhag bdun
87b4(mdo): gyi rgyags las kyang ma rdzas pa las lam yang nor myi gsum gyis kyang zlos te/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam tu zhugs sa/ da dung la ma ring zhig yod pa las/ rgyags chad nas/ de'i tshe rgyal po dang / btsun
87b5(mdo): mos skad phyung nas dung so// kyi hud kyi hud re sdug thog ma btsas nas da tsam gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba de 'dir myong bar gyur te/ da 'dir sdug cing 'phongs so zhes zer te lag pas mgo
87b6(mdo): la brdabs so// sa la 'gre zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas/ tshig 'di skad du smre sngags 'dod to// bdag cag gis tshe snga ma la sdig pa myi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas/ 'o nad te pha ma dpa gra bcom pa bsad dam/ 
87b7(mdo): 'on te dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab bam/ 'on te bathun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dben bgyis sam/ 'on te rngon pa dang nya ba byas sam/ 'on te srang dang bre bcos te pha rol la phrog rlom byas sam/ 'ond te dge 'dun gyi rna
87b8(mdo): spyod spyod dam/ ci byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar rgyurd ces/ de skad smras shing / cung zad 'astir ni dgra sleb na srog gi bar chad nges par 'byung / lam tu zhugs nas 'gror ni bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen
88a1(mdo): nas srog la bab tu cha'o// rgyal po btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen te skad phyung ste/ ngus pa dang sa la 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur da te/ de nas ring zhig lon pa dang / sangs nas 'di snyam du/ gsum
88a2(mdo): char lhan cig pu 'di kho nar 'chi zar gyur gyis/ btsun mo bsad la bdag dang bu'i srog tha rad par bya'o snyam bsams nas/ ral gyi phyung ste/ btsun mo gsad par bshams pa dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis rgyal po 'i lag pa nas
88a3(mdo): bzung ste/ de ltar ci zhig mdzad par dgongs shes gsol to// yab rgyal po'i myig nas mchims gang bzhin du rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad lnga khyod kyi srog gso snyam mo// gal te ma bsad
88a4(mdo): nas rang 'chi bar gyur da te/ kho bo ni 'chi 'am gson yang rung na/ bu khyod kyi srog gso ba'i phyir khyod kyi ma btsun mo bsad snyam mo// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol da to// gul te
88a5(mdo): btsun mo bsad par gyur dan de'i sha bdag myi 'tshal te/ ga po na ya da ma'i sha lo bu za ba myi srid pas/ bdag kyang 'chi bar gyur da to/ yab rgyal po tsa'i slad du bdag bkum ste pha ma'i srog tha rang bar myi mdzad/ ya
88a6(mdo): rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas// mod la khams 'gyel nas sa la 'gre zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smos so// khyod kho bo'i myig dang 'dran su zhig rang gi myig phyung ste bar byed// kho bo ni shi yang bla zas bu byi dasod ngo // 
88a7(mdo): thu bsad de sha ba myi nus so// de nas rgyal bu dge dan gyis yang ya brgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te yab yum gis bdag bkum nas sha khrag kyang ring po kyi thogs par rul sungs nas dgos pa su mchis khar gyur na/ 
88a8(mdo): bdag gis gsol ba cig cig ma gan na/ byams pa'i yab yul ma lags pas bdag gi yid dang myi 'gal ba mdzad du gsam+b+ha / de nas yab rgyal pos rgyal bu khyod yi ma dang kyi 'gal bar byas kyi na cigs sa badz+ras
88b1(mdo): myur du smos shig ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// yab yum gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ nyin re zhing bdag gi lus las sha t+ya ma gsum gsum bcad te/ cha gnyis
88b2(mdo): ni ya ba yum la dbul/ cig ni bdag 'tshal na lus srog gi gzungs su 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal pos kyang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du gnang nas/ nyi ma gcig bzhin sha rgya ma gsum gsum 'de de cha nyis ni rgyal po dang btsun
88b3(mdo): po bya/ cha cig ni rgyal bu rang ba ste/ lus dang srog gi gzungs byas nas/ lab tu zhugs te song ba las zhag gnyis yul pha rol da ma sleb par/ rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha bar te rus par tshigs dang mul tsam zhig 'brel te
88b4(mdo): thog gi lpag sanyam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyil to// danas d+ham po dang btsun mos rgyal bu bar du blangs nas skad can pos phyung nas yongs btab ste/ 'aM 'di skad ces smras pa// ded gnyis kyis ma rig par khyod kyi
88b5(mdo): te/ khyod 'dis bu pa'i zug 'bras kyi ba kyang yas yang dang sa khyod kyi sus kyi gan 'dang / dani lusaphyaganas 'dabar 'anag / dadas rgya ba dag dang byas skang rgya
88b6(mdo): ba rgyal po la 'di spyad ces gsold to// da 'di nas pa rol tu zhag gcig cas gyi lam las ma lus te/ bdag ni g.yo zhing bskyod myi nus pas srog 'dir 'dong ngo // rgyal po dang btsun mo ni gyi ma rabs ngan pa/ ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dim
88b7(mdo): gzhag gom gsung shig bdag la byams shing thugs 'artse bar dgongs na/ bdag gis bsam pa dang gyi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol// da dung yang bdag gi rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa ma lus par thogs la yul pha rolang tu
88b8(mdo): gshegs su gsol da/ de nas rgyal pos yang rgyal bus gsol ba bzhin du/ tshigs pa dang rus pa'i gseb na ci yod pa zad par btogs nas cha gsum du bgos te/ cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mos zos/ cha cig ni rgyal bus
89a1(mdo): sa rgya sas zhugs dpa dang / an nasas sa na pananyas nga gyu rgya
89a2(mdo): srong nas/ rgyal bu dge don gyi myig gis myi sod kyi b.rung / rgyal po dang btsun mo chags pa'i sems kyis myig myi 'dzums par lta lta nas ring zhig lo nad pa dang phying sa la 'gyes to// sha khrag gi dri bro bas phyogs
89a3(mdo): nas sbrang ma dang sha sbrang mang po 'dus nas/ rgyal bu yog pa tsam du lus la za zhing 'dzums te/ sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa/ de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig ma chad te/ skad phyung nas 'di skad ces smon lam
89a4(mdo): btab bo// bdag gi sngon gyi phyi dge ba'i las rnams ni 'dis byad zhing zad par gyur dacig pa/ deng smad cang myi bgyid do// bdag gi lus dapham la phul te sbyin pa byas pas bdag gi pha mas lhag pa'i bso
89a5(mdo): nams bcu gcig dang ldan te/ bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / rmyi lam ngan pa myi myib dang lhas bsrung ba dang / myis bkur ba dang / zhal mchu dang / rkun po dang dgra dang / chu lto byed pa myed
89a6(mdo): cing dus thams cad du bkra zhim par nog shig/ bdag gi sum lhag macam ga khrag spangs sa byin pas/ thams cad 'drangs ni mtshim par gyur da cig/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma sangs rgyas grub pa na gzhig
89a7(mdo): sangs rgyas su grub nas chos kyi sku po gnas kyang / chos kyi skus thams cad kyi 'akres bskam pa'i mu ke dang / skye shis 'tsha ba ba'i nad kyi bsel bar shog shig/ rgyal shub pa rnyed ces smon lam btab pas/ gnams
89a8(mdo): ma rnam padrug chugapas/ nyis yang mad kyi gsal par byas/ gcan dang / ridags rnam pa kyang rdzogasas sus chug/ rgyal po sa sa su 'thug sa/ khyos yul zhing lden/ sum la
89b1(mdo): gnas kyi bar du yang rab tu g.yos so// de'i tshe brgya byin lnga'i dbang pos 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang / 'dzam bu gling dag du babs nas/ rgyal bu don grub lo bsdongs pa'i phyir/ seng ge dang stag dang / 'phar smra
89b2(mdo): la stsogs pa'i lus su sprul nas/ myig dgrad/ kha gdangs/ sku sgre nas/ skad chen po'ing ro phyung ste/ rgyal bu la mchod pa bzhin du bsdigs so// de'i tshe rgyal bu ron grub gis/ gcan zan khro ba de dag
89b3(mdo): mthong nas kyang / skad myi ches 'as 'di skad ces smras so// khyod rnams kho bo za 'dod na mi bde bar zo shig/ 'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis bsdigs myi dgos shes bsko'o// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ bdag
89b4(mdo): cig ni seng ge 'am gtsun zan ma yin te/ brgya byin lnga'i dbang po yin te/ khyod bgam zhing bsad du 'ongs so// de'i tshe rgyal zhus rgya byin lnga'i dbang po mthong nas// shin tu dga' mgur rangs par yang
89b5(mdo): gyur to// de nas brgya byin gyis rgyal bu la sbas pa/ khyod kyis btang dka' ba btang ste/ lus kyi na khrag gis pa sa la bstsu pa'i bsod nams/ khyod bdud kyi rgyal po 'dod dam/ 'and te mangs
89b6(mdo): pa'i rgyal po 'dod dam/ spa'i dbang po 'dod ngas phyi'i rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dod/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni bdud kyi rgyal po 'am/ tshangs pa dang / lA'i rgyal po 'am/ myi'i rgyal po 'is
89b7(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ga pa yang myi 'dod de// sems can thams cad rnams grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni shin u yang
89b8(mdo): gti mug can zhig yin pa 'dran/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yun ring po nas shin tu dka' ba sbubs pas bzod 'grub na/ khyod kyis shin tu sdug bsngal ba bzod dam/ rgyal bus smras pa/ 
90a1(mdo): gal te lugs kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba bdag gi spyi bo'i stepan rgyun du 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gis/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog go// brgya byin
90a2(mdo): gyis smras pa/ khyod kyis smras pa stong pa 'di la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal bus dam bcas nas/ smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// ga lad te bdag gis smras pa'i tshig 'di brdzun
90a3(mdo): te lha'i dbang po bslus par gyur pa na/ bdag gi lus kyi rma 'di nam du yang 'tsho bar ma gyur da cig/ gal te bdag gis smras pa'i tshig bden na/ bdag gi lus kyang sor chud cing khrag kyang 'o mar gyur da ces
90a4(mdo): spras ma thag tu/ lus kyi rma yang snga ma kho na bzhin du sor de/ khrag kyang 'o mar gyur nas/ rgyal bu'i byad gzugs kyang snga ma pas lhag par bzang zhing sdug pa dang mdzes par gyur date
90a5(mdo): langs nas lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas so// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rgyal bu khyod legs so shi nad tu legs so// shi nang tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis
90a6(mdo): gdon myi za bar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// ring po myi thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na/ thog mar bdag gi don mdzad par
90a7(mdo): gyur dacig ces smras nas/ brgya byin lnga'i dbang po yang / nam mkha'i phyogs de nyid du myi snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo yang / rgyal po pha rol po de'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal
90a8(mdo): po des kyang rgyang ma nas bsu' nas/ dgos pa'i yo byad yid bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe rgyal po dang / btsun mo des rgyal bus lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la ji ltar bstabs pa/ rgyal po de la zhing
90b1(mdo): du brjod pa dang / rgyal po des ji ltar gyur pa de dag thos nas/ rgyal bu des lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pas/ sri zhu cher byas pa'i drin lan bsabs nas/ dmag rnam bzhi bshams nas/ 
90b2(mdo): rgyal po de dang yul ba man ser dpag drangs so// de'i tshe rgyal po de de mag rnam bzhi dang chas nas lam tu zhugs te/ rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnas su phyind pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi bu ni gdon myi za bar 'di
90b3(mdo): nyid du shin/ bu'i rus pa tsam bsdus te/ phyir bdag gi yul tu bkur ro snyam du sems nas/ skad phyung nas chu zhing bu'i rus bu srung du song song ba las/ rgyang ma nas bdag gi bu'i lus kyi ma yang sos nas
90b4(mdo): snga bas kyang bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ongs so// denas rgyal pos par du blangs te/ khyod du ga so na pa zhes smras dang / rgyal bus ji ltar gyur da pa yab rgyal po dang btsun mo la smras
90b5(mdo): so// rgyal po dang btsun mo rab tu dga' ste// thams cad na grangal zhon nas phyir bdag gi yul tu phyin pa dang / rgyal bu de'i bso rnams kyi mthus/ bdag gi yul yang phyi rnab nas/ 
90b6(mdo): kyan na/ du/ ga 'a na/ la gyu pa gzhan yi pa nam su bya pa
90b7(mdo): de de ltar gyi ste'o// depa'i phyi da/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ yab rgyal po ning ljang rje la yab zas gtsangs zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sum du gyurang pa de ni/ gzhan yin nam du byeng gyi
90b8(mdo): na/ de de ltar gyis ste/ de ni da ltar nga'i sum lnga mdzes zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe ngo'i dus na/ rgyal bu do grub ces bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin sum du khyod sems na/ ngang ltar gyi ltar/ 
91a1(mdo): de'i tshe de'i dus sa/ rgyal bu de ni da ltar shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba nga yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ brgya byin lnga'i dbang por gyur pa de ni/ da ltar kun shes ke'u de n+ya zhes bya ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das
91a2(mdo): gyis/ pha ma la sri zhu byed pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor de na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyed kyis/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / badre ba'i don la mkhas pa'i tshig gi spobs
91a3(mdo): pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu gnyis kyis/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po// gzhan yang phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rdul phra rab snyed kyis theg pa/ 
91a4(mdo): gnyis kyi sems spangs te/ theg pa gcig gis mthar phyi na pa gyurd to// dge bsnyen dang / dge snyen ma rdul phra rab snyed kyis/ 'a sa bu dang po nas theg pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i bam du thob par gyur
91a5(mdo): lha dang myi brgya stong ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba tu sems bskyed do// de ma yin pa lnga dang klu dang yi dgas dang / lA ma yin dang dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye
91a6(mdo): chen po dang / myi dang khyi ma lags pa la sogs pa tshogs yang po rnams/ la la ni bla na myed pa'i byang chub tu sems/ bskyed pa nas/ nyan thos dbang nga sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
91a7(mdo): kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du/ pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir/ lus kyi sha khrag gis kyang pha ma la bstabs shing / 
91a8(mdo): shin tu spyad dka' ba spyod pa ni 'di lta bu yin no// 'khor mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas so so nas phan pa/ dang gde ba'i don rnyed de/ dga' rabs nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs nas
91b1(mdo): bskang ba byas nas phyir dngag/ ba ga thas pas mkhas pa chen po// sangs rgyas drin lan bsapa pa'i mdo las/ sri shu'i lacu zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// // thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas zin lan
91b2(mdo): bsab pa'i mdog/ ta bam po gnyis pa/ tha ga da'i mi de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma ba'i napa pe'i di na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor kyis skar ma yang po mis kyis mnan pa'i
91b3(mdo): lta bu 'am/ klu 'khrul ba'i 'ang tshon ltam mcher zhing gsal ba la ltan myig myi chags pa bzhin nam/ bsams na yid 'khrul pa tsam du 'od zer lAm me lja der bzhugs te/ dper myi bzod pa ni srin bu myed khyer gyi
91b4(mdo): gyi 'od nyi ma shang ma thag tu myi snang ba 'am/ nyi zla la 'od zer brgya sa pa snyed yod kyang / brgya byin gyi drung na sol phung lta bu 'am/ brgya byin la 'od gsal ba yod kyang / tshangs pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo
91b5(mdo): gseg ma lta bu 'am/ mtshan mo dang nor bu rin po che'i 'od mu bstsu napa tsam 'am/ tshangs pa'i rgyal za chen po la 'od zeram dramu prA r+ya rgya stong snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od
91b6(mdo): ber gyi drung na pol ba'i phung po ltam gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer 'dom gang gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'dzinan gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to// de dag na gnas pa'i sems ca
92a1(mdo): po bdun bcu snyed san langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la 'go thos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du skor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig pu 'khod de/ thams cad kyis skad mthun par tshigs su bcad
92a2(mdo): pa brgya stong gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa byas pa la/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tog myed dbyangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
92a3(mdo): bde ba 'ba' shig sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma myed par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chad myed dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug
92a4(mdo): phud 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig rol dang / byang chub sems dpal rtog/ pa spong dang / byang chub sems dpal ye shes brtsegs dang byang
92a5(mdo): chub sems dpal dge gnas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dang / 'a rab tu mtshan myed dang / byang chub sems dpal blo gos 'o zeng dang byang chub sems dpa' khro zhing blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa
92a6(mdo): shin du bsrung gyur dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ba de dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i shes rab las
92a7(mdo): dang / rgyang chu thams dpa' ma 'tha' 'das dang / byang chub sems da bum sa du byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa chas pa byin dang / byang chub sems dpa dzi nas pa dang / bya chub sems dpal sna mnyan gnas
92a8(mdo): bya chub sems dpa shin tu sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag byed chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' grags pa'i yid dang / byang chub sems dbul zas pa bgyogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' das
92b1(mdo): phyug sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa chen pos skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa myed dang / byang chub sems dpa'
92b2(mdo): bzhi pa rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' de ni gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs myed lnga dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lci ba'i sdong po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyu las
92b3(mdo): 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu 'gro dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sde chen ma khams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ris spro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
92b4(mdo): 'jig rten gsum 'dzin da dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngom 'phral yod dang / byang chub sems dpal grags pa brjod dang / byang chub sems dpal nyi 'od gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtsan dang
92b5(mdo): rgya chub sems dpa' dus chod rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid mngon stond dang / byang chub sems dpal 'od rgyang gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i
92b6(mdo): mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid len sbyin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba myin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' mgu rangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan/ 
92b7(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib myed dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig myed dang / byang chub sems dpal ma chags lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgron ma chen po dang / byang chub
92b8(mdo): sems dpa' 'jig rtend 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs chen ston dang / byang chub sems dpa' mun nag gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam myed phyogs
93a1(mdo): la stsogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar yi dam 'di skad ces bcas so// bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das pa'i 'od du sangs rgyas kyi chos bsrung zhing
93a2(mdo): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas par bgyi zhing rgyud myi chad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dam pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa mthong nas/ 'od zer de dag las sangs rgyas
93a3(mdo): kyi chos bsam gyis myi khyab pa yang thos par 'gyur/ chos de dag thos nas sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas/ lha'i rin po cho ga ser ltar sems rnam par dag par gyur da pas/ thos
93a4(mdo): cad gsal bar snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro// bdag cag gis phan pa dang bde ba'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag dran pas/ de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa la stond pa chen por 'du shes skyes so// byams pa'i pha la
93a5(mdo): bu'i 'du shes skyes nas/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran te/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin shes par bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dam pa'i chos thos pas ring po myi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug
93a6(mdo): cing / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los bskor te/ sems can thams cad sgrol par gyur to// de dag kyang chos thos pas bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas
93a7(mdo): 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdun bcu po 'di dag yun ring po nas bskal pa grangs myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sngon rol na/ sangs rgyas bcom
93a8(mdo): ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed la bsnyen bkur byas te/ sangs rgyas de dag la rtag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / rgyal ba de dag la myi skyo ba'i sems kyis mnyes
93b1(mdo): par byas nas/ byams pas bdag gi lus bsrungs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin cing snying rje chen pos rgyu nang du phyogs bcur thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed do// sems can gang zhig tha ma shi kar byang chub sems
93b2(mdo): dpa' de dag las/ gcig gi mying ngam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi nas bdun bcu'i bar du rdzogs thos te/ de srog phyogs skyabs su song na/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu gang na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
93b3(mdo): khams su pad mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod chags dang yongs su bral ba dang / mngal gyi gnas nas myi skye ba dang / gnam zhing stsogs dang bral bar gyur da te/ lus yongs su dag cing lus dri zhim pa dang / 
93b4(mdo): thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur stir byed byed par 'gyur ro// kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byis byas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// se mas rab tu dgal bas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
93b5(mdo): tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed pas/ sems cad thams cad la byam sa pa dang snying rjes chen po'i sems bskyed par 'gyur/ de ltar byas
93b6(mdo): pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed pas/ 'gro ba ma lus pa la btang snyoms su myi gtong ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur/ gzhan yang sems can la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang / bdag dang gzhan ni
93b7(mdo): don byed pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bar 'gyur ba bsal ba'i sems dang / nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i sems dang / 'dun pa'i yid kyis
93b8(mdo): chos nyan pa'i sems dang / myi brjod pa yid la byed cing don pa mang ba gzungs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang / nyung ngu nas la don mang du ma shel pa'i sems dang / dmang du thos la ngan myi shes pa/ myi 'dod pa'i
94a1(mdo): sems skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dag pa nyid la dad pa'i sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skyes pas
94a2(mdo): ji ltar bstand pa'i bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skyed par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems bskyed pas/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ de ltar phyir ldog pa'i
94a3(mdo): sems skyes pas/ sems can thams cad la mnyam snyoms pa'i gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bdag khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar skye bar myi dga' bzhin du/ gzugs yod pa
94a4(mdo): dang gzugs myed pa dang / rkang bzhi dang rkang mangs dang / grog/ sprun bar du srog chags thams cad de dnga'adra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog gyi bar du stor yang pha rol po'i
94a5(mdo): srog 'brog pa'i lam myi byed do// ji ltar bdag la no rdzas dang / 'bru dang gos dang zas dang skam dang / ban glang dang shing / dang / theg pa dang yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang
94a6(mdo): lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams la srung zhing rim gro byed do// gzhan gyis khyer zhing 'phrog pa la myi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub seMs
94a7(mdo): dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang / sems can rnams kyi nor dang gos dang / zas dang skom dang / longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems myi skyed do// ji ltar bdag gi gzugs dam pa'i sring mo 'am
94a8(mdo): chung ma 'amams pa gnan gyis kyi rigs par byed kyi 'did ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ da bu san byung chub sems dpa la ni bdag gi lus dang srog zhe kya pa yang ba'i
94b1(mdo): gzugs dam pa la 'du shes ngan pa log pa'i sems myi skyed na phyi rigs pa'i chos ngan pa lta ci smos/ ji ltam bdag phra ma dang / tshig rtsub pa drag par 'gyur ba la myi dga' bar 'gyur ba bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyang
94b2(mdo): kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang / btsun du smra ba dang / ban tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig kyi smra'o// ji ltar bdag rdo dbyug gis rdeg pa dang / wAg gis bzhu dang / nan
94b3(mdo): la 'bor ba la gyi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang / rdo dbyug dang lug dang chad pas bcad pa'i las kyis sems can
94b4(mdo): rnams la gyi 'a'o// ji ltar bdag lcags sgrog dang bang sna ma snan dang / bzung ba dang btags dang / bcing bas bcing ba'i gnod pa rnams la myi dga' ba bzhin du thams can kun kyang de dang 'dras
94b5(mdo): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang phrag yam lalags sgrog dang khor sgril dang / bzung ba dang bcing ba la stsogs pa ga/ nod pas 'dre gyi byed do// ji ltar bdag gis gzhan gyis bas
94b6(mdo): ba dang / dbang dang tshus ngag zhus byed ba dang / dbang rnam batshan bye ga sa ga na du byed pa sa myi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams dpa de dang dra ste/ ma sems dpa 'di bden gcig dum
94b7(mdo): dang srog yal yang / tshul bzhin ma yin pam rgya rigs pas sems can la gnod pa myi byed do// ji ltar bdag la pa rol po gzhan gyis 'aku sti byed pa mchod dpa cin snyan pas spyod/ bdan dem dag
94b8(mdo): bzhin du bdag gis kyang sems can rnams la gos dang zas dang / skom dang mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyend rtsi dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sbyin par bya'o// gal te bdag gis las ched po zhig sgrub 'am/ sangs rgyas
95a1(mdo): kyi bI ram/ chos kyi phyir lam/ dge 'dun gyi phyir dam/ don sgrub pa las blos kyi lpags te/ don grub par ma gyur nas kyi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis bdungs pa las/ mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig
95a2(mdo): sa bdag gis bsgrubs pa'i don myi dga' zhing mya ngan byed pa mthong nas/ bdag la 'di skad ces zer ro// rigs kyi bu khyod myi dga' ba ma byed cig/ khyod kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya ste/ don yid bzhin du grub pa
95a3(mdo): byed zhes zer na de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ dbas na bdag gis sems ngan ma phan pa dang / bde ba mingon tu bsgrub pa'i las kyi rogs bya'o// ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang / rkun po da cu ma skyes
95a4(mdo): gnad par 'gyur ras/ blod po la stsogs pas bzung nas/ btags sam/ cings na myi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par 'gyur ba las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag de ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs pa mtha
95a5(mdo): da/ snyan pa dang ba spro ba'i tshig gis bdag la khyod mya ngan ma byed cig// khyod kyi phyir kho bos rgyal po'am blon po la gsol ba btab ste gal te na nor sug sbyin po 'am/ thams rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
95a6(mdo): ci nas kyang khyod myi bde ba'i sdug bsngal las tha rad par bya'o// zhe sa zer na/ bdag gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyis sems dga' bar gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni shes par bya ba'i rgyu
95a7(mdo): rtsal dang / bzo'i bar du mthar phyi nad par brtson 'grus su slob bo// 'di lta ste shes par bya ba'i rigs pa'i gnas dang / bzo'i gnas dang / rol mo dang rtsed mo dang grangs dang / rtsis dang / myig 'phrul gyi sngags dang
95a8(mdo): sman dang ban glang dang rta dang zhon pa dang / dgra chos dang dmag drang ba dang / dpyad la sngags pa la mkhas par sA tra ste/ de skar smra rtsal che la yang mkhas par bslabs nas// 'gro la mang ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon
95b1(mdo): 'jug par byed do// ma pa'i skye za dang spyod nul mthun pa ltung byed kyang sems can la phan pa yodan dun nu na po che gting mar byed kyi/ sems can la gnad ba kyi phan pa'i rin myi byed do// gang dbul bal 'das
95b2(mdo): pa rgya pa ga rgya nu 'asgoms dpa'i grong du man// ram ci 'dod bzhin sutha btsum sems dpa'i sun par byed do// sems can gapa'ig sangs rgyas kyi chos la mas shing dang / byang chub sems dpal
96a1(mdo): bsnyen bkum ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rim gro dang g.yog byed cing / rkang pa 'khrug pa'i las byed dam/ lus bkru ba dang mnye ba'i las byed dam// chag chag dang phyag dang byed dam/ so shing dang khrus chur spyong ngam
96a2(mdo): stan 'dings shing mas gos sdug pa'i las byed dam/ srang tho rangs la yar me 'bud dam/ khye'u sum dang gro la kha zas man ban dang / bu sha ni dang / khang ni 'bul lam/ 'thung ba'i skom u li shi dang / shu la ka sha ka'i 'bras bu'i skom
96a3(mdo): dang / rnan dang / la dag pa'i chul rdzogs pas snang chu / sa byang de ltar bus nag 'dun sa zhag gu cu'i bar byang chub sems dpa' satsam dad pa'i phyir 'bul par byed// byang dum thams dang
96b1(mdo): skra 'bal te/ mchi ma 'dzag cing sa la 'gre'o// de nas khyogs sam shing rta'i steng du bzhag nas dur khyod du skyel te/ de ltar bskyal nas kyang bu smad dag gi phyir khyim du 'ongs nas mya ngan gyis bdungs te/ la la ni brgyal
96b2(mdo): nas sa la 'dri/ la la ni de'i rkyend kyis nang du 'gyur/ la la ni myi dran nas myos/ la la ni che'i bar chad du shi bar gyur da te/ de ltar byas kyang gson pa rnams la ni phan pa myed/ shi ba la ni rab tu gnod to// de'i
96b3(mdo): tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor dang bcas te yul rgyu zhing song ba las/ sems can mya ngan gyis gzir ba mthong nas snying brtse ba'i sems skyes te 'di skad zer ro// rgyal po zhes bya ba ni yul sa la dbang zhing 'gro
96b4(mdo): ba mang po'i dbang sbyar te/ de ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyis 'gro ba rnams btul te 'bras bu 'dod pa lA mchog dam pa thob tu zin kyang skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang / myi rtag pas 'jigs pa las
96b5(mdo): tha rad par ma gyur da na/ bdag gis drang po'i mchog gis yul gyi srid btsas kyang phan pa'i don myed do// de ltar 'gro ba rnams phan pa'i don myed na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhes kyang ci'i phyir bya/ byis
96b6(mdo): pa chen po na pa zhe 'am/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po zhes 'am/ 'dren pa'i stond pa chen po zhes ji skad du gdags/ 'dren pa'i stond pa chen po zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i lam du 'dren cing / mya ngan las 'das
96b7(mdo): pa'i lam stond te/ 'dus ma byas pa'i rab tu bde ba thob par byed do// bdag cag ni myi dang spyod par myi mthun te/ dpepan myi zhig skom pas 'dungs nas srog la bab pa las// chu 'dod pa'i phyir phan tshun rgyugs
96b8(mdo): te/ khron pa skam po zhog dang phrad nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ 'di snyam du sems so// da ni bdag gi lus 'di 'chi ba las phyir soso so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te chu dang ma phrad na/ srog 'di 'chig
97a1(mdo): las myi ring bar khron pa bzang po dang 'phrad nas/ gdon myi za bar chu dong drang po gtsang ma dang phrad de/ ngoms shing tshim par 'gyur ro// snyam bsams nas myur ba myur bar khron pa'i drung ngu bsnyen to// khyor/ 
97a2(mdo): ba'i drung du phyind nas lus la gon pa'i gos phud te phyogs gcig tu sbas nas/ chu 'dod pa'i phyir khron pa'i nang du zhugs so// khron pa'i gting tu phyind nas chu ni myed kyi sprul gdug pa dang / smigs pa dang sdig pa dang
97a3(mdo): tshangs pa dang / sbal pa dang de la stsogs pa gyo mo dang gseg ma dang / shing dang / rtsa nyal nyil 'ba' zhig mthong bar gyur to// de'i tshe skom pas nyam zag par gyur da pa de/ thog ma leb bzhin du chu yang ma rnyed la
97a4(mdo): gdug pa mang pos bzal nas khron pa de las phyir byung bar gzas kyang / khron pa nyid ma rnyings shing zhig la zas kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam yod de/ de'i nang skabs sam thag srad dam 'bru ba'i shing tsam yang myed de mas
97a5(mdo): mchod du brtsal yang / nyam zag la stobs zhan 'phar myi nus te/ phyir yang zhabs su lhung nas sprul gdug pa la stsogs pas rba zhing 'jib bo// de cung zad cig srog ma chad kyi bar du 'di skad ces
97a6(mdo): zer ro// bdag khron pa 'di'i nang na chu myed pa ltar shes na lta/ blo na pa 'di la myig gis lta yang myi bodan/ 'di'i nang du zhugs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ da ni khron pa 'di'i rkyend kyis sdug sngal ba'i
97a7(mdo): sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes smre sngags 'don no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang de ltar sa lo'i skye bo dag gcig shi ba'i 'og tu khyim gang gi bu smad dang gnyen rnams kyis sdug pa dang bye bral ba'i sdug bsngal
97a8(mdo): gyis gdungs pa mthong nas 'di skad zi po bdag gi lus 'di ni khron pa skem po dang 'dra ste/ khron pa'i myo do tsam yod kyi yun myed pas na 'jug pa yod kyang thob pa byed pas/ de lta bu'i lus dang srog stong ba'i sdug
97b1(mdo): myong bar 'gyur ro// da ltar bdag 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po 'di dbang sgyur zhing rin pa che sna bdun dang ldan te dge ba bcu'i las kyis 'gro ba 'dul zhing drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid bcas nas/ skye bo mang po dag lnga
97b2(mdo): myi'i mtho ris kyi gnas su bkod de/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan mchog dam pa la longs spyod du bcug kyang // de dag skye ba dang rga ba dben pa dpa'achi ba dang / sdug pa dang bye bral ba dang dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal la
97b3(mdo): tha dad par ma nus ste/ gcig la gcig tu zhing tshong byed pa 'di ni bdag gis nyes kyi/ sems can rnams kyis mnyes so// de ci ltar zhe na bdag la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'gro ba mang po la dran pa'i don
97b4(mdo): du 'gyur ba myed de/ bdag la dge ba'i chos 'dod cing rab tu bde 'a dad kyang sdug bsngal gyi mtsho las rgal myi nus so// de'i tshe 'khor los skya ba'i rgyal po yang 'di snyam du sems so// da ltar bdag gi lus
97b5(mdo): 'do da per dashes pa myed pa gnyi mun can ni spyad bdag das das tus gnas zhig na/ ma 'dun gi yang dutharab ma 'bapas zin pa chen 'byung ste kyi ni yang skabs 'du yang rab tu rten
98a1(mdo): rjer pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi bar tu khyer/ kha cig ni nang grol mchin pa dang / mcher ba dang / khro ba dang / rgyum dang / gzhang rnams khyer ba mthong ngo // de lta bu dag mtho 'a nas sbyin bdag res
98a2(mdo): dag la khyer khur du khyer ba 'di dag ci yin zhes dris so// de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis khur du khyer ba 'di dag ni myi ro ste/ myi'i mgo dang / rka lag dang / rwa dang rje dar dang / yan lag dang nying lag gi bar du'o// 
98a3(mdo): khyed myi'i mgo dang yan lag dang nying lag gi bar du khyer ba 'di ci dgos/ ci zhig bya zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyod myi shes sam/ mu ge chen po byung nas 'bru rab tu dkon par gyur te/ myi kun tu ltogs nas/ 
98a4(mdo): da ltar gcig lo gcig za bas bdag cag gi khur du khyer pa 'di ni bdag cig gi zas yin na/ de'i tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de skad ces smras pa de thos nas sngangs ste/ spu zing zhes byed nas khams te sa la 'gyel pa las
98a5(mdo): mya drang mos gdong tu gtor nas ring zhig lon pa dang / sems sor chung nas/ yon khyed kyi zas yin na 'di dag su yi sha yin zhes dris padang / de dag skad chen po byung nas dus te sbyin bdag la brjod du kyi rung
98a6(mdo): ngo zhes smras te/ e ma'o bdag cag ni sdug go// me ma ho bdag cag ni sdug go// kyi hud kyi phud/ khyod la drang bar myi smad myi rung ste/ bdag cag khu ru du khyer ba 'di/ la la ni ba'i sha la la ni ma'in/ ma la ni bu na/ las
98a7(mdo): bu ba'in/ mas gnyen bzhes kyi ga yan na zhes lhags pa de dag gis mi sa nas/ sgrim bdag sa dang ba gtam byas nas/ bdag cag ni gning du lhags pas gcig la gcig shing ga za bar gyur to// da'i mi sbyin bdag pa
98a8(mdo): dbugs kyis nangs pa tsam du/ myi ltogs pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed rnams dong byin dacad gcig la gcig nyid sha za ba ma byed cig/ khyod rnams la dgos pa'i yo byed gapa yang rung / zan po'i gos
98b1(mdo): bzang ba 'am btung ba 'am nad kyi rkyend rtsi 'am/ yo byad gang ci dgos pa thams cad sbyin par bya ste nga ste zhag 'dun na khyed rnams kho bo'i sgor shog shig yid bzhin du gos sam kha zas sam nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / mi 'dod pa'i tshim par
98b2(mdo): bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang de dag rab tu dga' rangs nas shin 'atu legs so lags so mtsha chem zhes bstod pa byas so// de nas sbyin bdag de phyir khyim du 'ongs nas chung ba dang cu rnams bram khal dang / las byed pa'i phyi rnams
98b3(mdo): kyang bsdus te/ dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig snyan pas/ bu smad dang bran khol dang las byed pa'i myi rnams 'di skad ces bsgo'o// khyed rnams shes bor gyis shog/ kho bos smras pa'i tshig
98b4(mdo): legs par nyon cig khyed rnams shes sam phan pa chen pos mu ke b+h+ya banas/ myi thams cad lcogs ste grangs byed pa zhig shi ba gyur to// bdag cag gi khyim na dang mdzod kun gang zhing lud te/ 'phrul pa
98b5(mdo): byed pa zhig sa pas/ dus lam sa mal yang bdag rnamapa bya zhes/ bum kun kyis na man pa pa/ na du bdun ga gsan sum tsun
98b6(mdo): kyang gyi phyengs na / bab mdzod dang nor dang rdzas dang kha bas sa spos kyang ci dgos// de nas sbyin bdag kyang rab tu dgal rangs nas/ khyed rnams ni yang dag par kho bo'i blan byed pa'i byang cu bu thob par byed pa'i grogs yin pa sa
98b7(mdo): dge migasaso// byed rnams sa sonas ci rgya banams cid sgrib pa sa rgya tshogs pa yang yodas/ sgru pa mi rigs pa sa rgyam cu bsgrub ste/ dkri zhag bdun ni rim bdun bya par bya// de mi
98b8(mdo): bdag des me sor bsgo nas/ khyim bdag gi phyi rol tu byung ste/ gang nas mnyam zhing langs la bde ba'i gnas shig bltas nas/ mo sa las gzhi dag par nyal nyis dpas nga myed par phyogs te khri stan bshams so// 
99a1(mdo): ngos kyim ze 'du ba'i gan su sbyin pa tsur pa'i gzhi bshams nas/ banagrang sa brgyal khabs bkal te/ blun pa'i sang bskyal nas/ kha zas ni 'i bzhin du sungs/ na chu dam tsho bzhin du bskyil na
99a2(mdo): dang bu ram dang khur ba la stsogs pa/ khams ro brgya dang ldan pa chom lo rgu sbyar te/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang gos dang gdu bu dang 'phreng ba dang / lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang / ban glang dang rta dang rin po che sna bdun la phyogs te
99a3(mdo): thams cad phud sum tshogs par sbyar nas zhag bdun lon pa'i skya rengs shar nas zhag bdun gyi nyi ma la dril dang rnga brdungs dung bus te/ skad chen pos thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas 'dir 'dus shig ces bos so// de'i chen thams
99a4(mdo): cad kyis khas pa'i skad thos nas 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa tsam tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ thams cad sbyin pa chen po gtong ba'i gnas su lpags te/ yid bzhin du gos dang mal cha dang zas dang skom dang / 
99a5(mdo): lus kyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / nad kyi rtsi sman mang po dang / ban glang dang / rta dang rin po che sna bdun la stsogs pa ci dang mi 'dod pa/ yid bzhin du drangs nas sbyin pa'i rdzas ci yod pa/ thams nad
99a6(mdo): cad kyis ma lus par khyer ro// de nas sbyin bdag de rab tu dga' nas phyir khyim du 'ongs nas/ chung ma dang bu rnams dang dga' bzhin du 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod do// de nas zhag bdun tsam lon pa dang / myi dag na re sbyin bdag
99a7(mdo): des sngar gos dang zas dang skom las stsogs pa sbyin pa ni byas na/ kha zas zos pa rnams dug langs nas thams cad shi'o zhes zer ro de ltar shi bar gyur pas thams cad kyis tshig tu brjod de/ ngo mtshar che'o// ngo mcha
99a8(mdo): che'o// de ltar sbyin bdag chen po des kun la snying brtse ba'i phyir mi 'dod pa bzhin du kha zas la stsogs pas tshim par byas te/ lus dang srog gson par byas par gyur na phyis zhag mang po ma lon par dug langs nas/ 
99b1(mdo): mas cad na 'bar sgrogs par gyur to// dal sbyin bdag chen po ngos de ltar gyu rang pa de thos nas/ yi mug cing kyi dga' bar gyur te/ chung ma rang bu la stsogs pa la khyed kyis kha zas ji ltar sbyar na/ khabs kyi nang du su
99b2(mdo): ma rungs pa ji ltar 'ongs shes dris pa dang / chung ma rang bu dang bran kol dang / las byed pa rnams kyi mchid nas dug myi srid do// dug 'di dag ga las 'ongs zhib tu rtogs shig ces smras so// de nas sbyin bdag de khyim
99b3(mdo): kyi zhal ta byed mthar gyis mang song ba las/ khron pa zhig steng bkab cing g.yogs pa mthong ngo // khron pa 'di ci'i phyir g.yogs shes dris pa dang / khron pa 'di ni khyim bdag khyod bus pa chung ngu'i che na/ sbrul gdug pa/ 
99b4(mdo): gsum zhig gso gso' ba las/ khron pa 'di rkos nas sprul gdug pa gsum po 'di'i nang du bcug nas bzhag go// khron pa 'di 'i sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa yin no// chu yang gdug pas chu 'di yang
99b5(mdo): 'thungs pas na ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sbyin bdag des tshig rje dag thos nas/ las byed pa dag la khyed de bar kha zas g.yo ba'i tshe/ khron chu 'di las bcus te kha zas ma g.yos sam/ las byed pas smras
99b6(mdo): pa/ khwa zas mar du g.yos pas rings nas chu 'di bcus nas kha zas kyi g.yos byas so zhes smras pa dang / khyim bdag myi dga' ste/ ngo mtshar che'o// ngo mtshar che'o// bdag ni gti mug can shes pa'i blo myed pa
99b7(mdo): yin pa 'draT+Te/ mi gyi skus gdun pa gas zhing khron pa gdug pa no zhes 'gyod nas chung ba dang bul bsgob/ sbrul gdug pa gsum gi zhon pa myur dutshangs shig/ skus gdug pa gsum yags pa bdag
99b8(mdo): bsreg go zhes brno ba dang / las byed pa'i phyi rnams kyis de ma phag mkhron pa de yang bsrubs nas byed par byas so// de nas sbyin bdag des sprul gdug pa'i dran par byed par byab nas/ byalam bcu chag tuman
100a1(mdo): na// 'din can gis de sang gis na dang sa songs b.rung zhes 'byung ba skyes so// de bzhin du 'kham mas sbyar ba rgyam zer yang dge ba 'dum sems pan 'dus te/ sems can dag lnga dang bya'i mamachim su
100a2(mdo): du ga sa ma las kyi pa ga/ 'das pa ma ma par ba ga ca
100a3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos bsgrubs te sems can rnams kyang de la/ klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'bri ba dang / goms par bya ste/ skye shi 'khor ba yongs su
100a4(mdo): zhing mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya'o zhes dam bcas so// de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir 'dzam bu gling na sangs rgyas kyi chos sus shes zhes
100a5(mdo): gnas kun tu bkar btags so// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos 'dod pa'i phyir gnas kun tu bkar btags kyang shes pa ma byung ngo // mtha' 'khob kyi yul chung ngu gcig tu phyin pa dang / den
100a6(mdo): bram ze gcig cig sangs rgyas kyi chos shes so zhes zer ro// de nas bram ze de'i steng du pho nya btang nas pho nya de bram ze ga la der phyi nad to// der phyi nad nas btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes
100a7(mdo): dris na zhes po zhes zer ro// de nas po nya bram ze'i gang pa la mag zos phyag byas nas/ btsun pa 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal pos spyan 'dren du btang gyis/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i gas pa
100b1(mdo): gshegs su gsam// de nas bram ze yang der 'ongs nas 'khor la sbyar ba'i rgyal pos rgyangs nas bsus te/ rkang pa la mgo zos phyag byas nas/ bde bar byed nam/ lam tu nyon mongs par ma
100b2(mdo): gyurd tam/ ral bar ma gyur da tam/ zhes gtam dris te pho brang gi nang du khyed nas pho brang gi dbus su rgyal po'i bdan la bzhag go// bram zes kyang ba dan la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas/ 
100b3(mdo): de'i tshe rgyal pos bram ze de bde bar 'dug nas dgos pa'i yo byad rnams kun phul te sbyin pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te bram ze de la ston pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes dris pa dang bram zen
100b4(mdo): re bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos shes so zer ro/ de nas rgyal pos bram ze la stonod pa chen po bdag la bston cing bshad du gsol zhes byas na/ bram ze na re rgyal po khyod ni shin tu glen no// khab
100b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos la bslabs pa na/ yun rings dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas/ 'dod lobs pa yin na/ nga rgyal pos 'thal byung thos par 'dod dam// rgyal pos smras pa// ston
100b6(mdo): pa chen po 'on ci zhig 'dod pa/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag la mchod pa phul cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ stond pa chen po'i mchod pa ci zhig 'dod/ gos sam mal cha 'am/ bza' ba 'am/ btung
100b7(mdo): 'dod das/ 'on te gseramam/ dngul lam/ rin po che 'dod dang/ bram zes smras pa/ bdan de 'brab 'i mchod pa kyi 'dod do// rgyam pos smras pa/ mchod pa de dag kyi 'dod ni/ 'od banagra
100b8(mdo): ta'am theg pa 'dod dmapa/ 'on te yul las// grong kyi dzam/ chungs 'am/ shu 'dod dam/ rol mo 'am/ klu 'am gar byed pa 'dod dam/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag ni de dag da/ 
101a1(mdo): dang / bya ma na su gyu @#@#/ la zhan pa #// rgam ca sa bya tshus napa/ 
101a2(mdo): sangs te 'dal/ zhes rnam pan / rgyal bas skad cigan pa sanas smras kyi bar du ni las bsas so// ngangs rgyal bas par du blangs nas snyan pa chen ba cung bang nyag sring du gsol bdag shes pa zhag cing bam nams nu
101a3(mdo): bcung bang bsams tha mching ba bgying ngazhes smras pa/ re'i 'i 'khar lo sbyor ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag gi lus 'di thog ma byed pa'i dus nas shi ba grangs myed pa myong nas kyang yang chos kyi phyi ma zhing
101a4(mdo): da yang bdag gi lus 'di yang mthar 'jig cing rus par gyur dpas phan pa myed na/ da ni dus la bab po snyam bsams nas/ stond pa bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so// stond pa chen po bdag la mchod pa 'dod pa bzhin bgyid do
101a5(mdo): de nas rgyal po pho brang du song nas/ btsun mo rnams la da ni bdag ga bye bral lo zhes smras so// btsun mo rnams de skad ces smras pa 'o sa nas sngangs shing khams te/ ci nyes gtol byed de/ rgyal po ltar
101a6(mdo): ci zhig mdzad snyam dgangs zhes gsol lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag gi lus 'di la yang me stong zhig btsugs te sto na pa bram ze mam dpa bya snyam mo// btsun mo rnams kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ 
101a7(mdo): sa la 'gre zhing chongs btab ste brgyal lo// ring zhig lon pa dang phyir dran pa rnyed do// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten dan bdag gi lus las phangs pa myed de/ nyes su rogs nas gso' ba'i rim 'gro cher byed na ci'i phyir bdag gi lus
101a8(mdo): la 'gro 'tsham zhing gnod pa bgyid rgyal po ni mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa lags na/ da ltar myos sam 'on te yid dgas kyis brlams sam ci nongs// rgyal pos smras pa/ de lta bu gang yang ma yin no// 'on ci'i phyir de lnga
101b1(mdo): rnamams can pa 'ang rgyang ma pos rnas pa/ 'dig tan nasapa jug pa mas cad par bye bas stsuste// rlabs bdag ni sus kyis mtshang pa sa te/ byed dang thams can mams cad kyi mun gan
101b2(mdo): rang rang gi sgra 'bal lo// bdag cag la bsod nams byed myi shis pas gson par bdag cag la lA myed par 'gyur zhes sme'o// rgyal po de la rgyal bu lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang mngal byed pa
101b3(mdo): zhing sdug pa/ yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa myi mtshan dang rdzogs par ldan pa/ rgyal po yang myig bzhin du 'phangs shing byams so// de'i tshe rgyal pos rgyal bu rnams la smras pa/ kho bo da mchod pa'i las
101b4(mdo): shig byed snyam na/ lus dang srog nyams su chung ngu dogs te/ khyed dang bral ba snyam// yul gyi srid dang 'bangs rnams kyi tshis ni tshe rims kyis byos shig ces bsgo'o// rgyal bu rnams de skad ces bsgo ba zos nas// lus
101b5(mdo): kyi yan lag dang carnams bcad pa tsam du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te/ dper nabyis pa nangs pa las skyug tu yang byed/ myir du yar byed pa bzhin rgyal ba la 'di skad ces gas med to// ci'i slang du bdag can
102a1(mdo): / pa'i masapa nga/ na pa nang pa nas 'azung nas skang byu sa rgya zhing / chud/ cang bya ba nan dang sgrub pa myang bar 'gyu zhes
102a2(mdo): de nas rgyal pos rgyal bu rnams la spro ba spyod pa'i phyir 'jig rten mdza' zhing sdug pa thams cad mthar bye bral bar 'gyur ro// zhes bska'o// de skad ces bsgo ba thos kyang yid gcags te 'bral gyi phod na bdag cag gis
102a3(mdo): gsol ba gcig gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag gi lus srog rgyal po la 'bul na/ stond pa bram ze la mchod pa mdzad du gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyed rnams ni ngad dung shed ma bye la chung bas de 'dra ba'i
102a4(mdo): mchod pa byed myi bzod kyi/ kho bo ni ston pa lam ring po nas gnyer te mchod pa bya bar khas blangs pas/ yid dang 'gal bar byar myi rung bas/ bu sri zhu can ni pa'i yid dang 'gal ba myi byed na/ khyed rnams kho bo'i yid dang
102a5(mdo): 'gal bar byed dam/ rgyal bu rnams de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas skad phyung ste cho nges btab pas/ yul gyi lha rnams kyang spangs te/ mi 'gyel ba bzhin du thams cad lus sa la brdabs so// de'i tshe rgyal
102a6(mdo): po la yul mtha'i rgyal phran thams cad kyis kyang mchi phyag byas nas/ pho brang gi nang stond pa chen po ga la ba der song ste/ de'i drung du phyind nas lus kyi rgyan thams kyang bkrol nas gos kyang phud te phyogs gcig bla zhag
102a7(mdo): nas/ lus drang por bsrang ste 'dug go// 'dug ma thag rgyal phran rnams dang blon po dang rgyal bu lnga brgya dang / btsun mo nyi khri la bsgo'o// khyed rnams las gang zhig kha ba'i lus la wa sto ba zhig gcod nus sam zhes
102a8(mdo): smras na/ btsun mo dang rgyal bu dang blon po dang / rgyal phran rnams tshig mthun par bdag cag gis rang gi lus la gri thogs te myig phyung yang bla'o rgyal po'i lus la rma 'byin myi phod do// de nas rgyal po myi dga' nas da ni bdag
102b1(mdo): nas dani bdag le shus gyur dpo ste/ 'khor mang po 'di snyed cig kyi nang na/ myi 'gal yang kho bo'i grog su gyur ba myed dpa zhes spro bar gyur to// de'i mi rgyal ba do la rigs ngan shan pa rang bzhin gyis khro la/ kun kyang 'di
102b2(mdo): su rung ba zhig ya par dang thos so// shan pa'i de rangs so// shan pa de'i ngangs nas rgyal bu rnams la khyed bye nam byed cig/ rgyal po chen po'i den myi 'grub pa'i thabs bdag la mchis kyis/ dod ma grub na sa
102b3(mdo): zhin rgyam pa'i sring 'thu drub dang nas smras so// rgyam bunanas mig de skad pas smras pathos nas/ rab tu dga' mamams skyes par gyur to// de nas shan pa de rgyal ba'i drung du 'ongs nas rgyal mtshan pa'i
102b4(mdo): ltar ci zhig mdzad par dgongs shes gsol ba dang / rgyal pos spras pa kho bo'i lus la mar me stong btsugs la stonod pa chen po bram ze la mchod par sems so// shan pas smras pa de ltar na skul gnod
102b5(mdo): nus so// rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i semags su gyur danas shan pa la khyod ni yang dag par kho bo'i bla na myed pa'i byad chub sgrub pa'i grogs yin no zhes smras so// de nas shan pas rgyal
102b6(mdo): po'i drung du 'greng bzhin du/ ngam rung ba'i skad chen pos rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po mkhyend ta ma/ myi bsad pa'i chos kyis ni sngar mgo bcad dgos te/ gnya' rngubs la rka lag kyang phral te/ 
102b7(mdo): ba dang rgyus pa yang dbyung dgos na/ rgyal po chen po de 'dra ba'i na tsha ba'i sdug bsngal bzod dam/ rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur nas/ de nas shan pas gnag lce lta bu'i gri
102b8(mdo): thogs te/ ring po sa thogs pa rgyal po'i lus la ma stong tsam pa por bcad do// shar pa rgyal za sems phyin nu pa tsam du sems pa las// sems ma chung bas gri sangs la no monas zas so// de nas rgyal pos chen pa'i/ 
103a1(mdo): lus la rma stong bcad pa'i lam tu mar khu blugs nas/ ras bzang po'i snying po gtsugs te mar me stong btsugs so// de'i tshe bram ze'i stond pa chen pos de ltar byas/ 'di snyam du da ni myur du chos ma bshad
103a2(mdo): na/ lus srog 'tsho'am/ myi 'tsho gtol myed pas/ gal te srog ma sos na sus chos mnyan par 'gyur bsams nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas kyi chos thos par 'dod pas shin tu/ 
103a3(mdo): dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis bya dka' ba'i spyod pa spyad pas legs par nyon la shinang tu yid la zung shig dang 'argya la kyi chos bstand par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa thos nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur pa te/ 
103a4(mdo): dper na bu sri zhu can zhig pa ma shin rab tu myi dga' ste/ sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa las pha ma phyir sos pa nas/ rgyal de ji ltar rab tu dga' ba ltar/ rgyal po de yang rab tu dga' bar gyur to// de nas hri
103a5(mdo): ze des rgyal po la smras pa/ skye ba yod na 'chi bar 'gyur// 'gog pa 'di ni bde ba yin// zhes tshigs su bcad pa phyed po/ 'di bstand to// rgyal pos dam pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas/ ra
103a6(mdo): tu dga' ba'i semasu gyur da te// rgyal bu dang blon po rnams la'i di skad ces bsgo'o// khyed rnams kho bo la sdug cing brtse ba'i sems yod na chos 'di ma brjed par yid la bzung la/ yul phyogs su gang
103a7(mdo): na mying mang po 'dus pa'i gnas dang / grong dang grong khyer dang tshong 'dus su 'gro ba mang po la 'di skad ces bka' thogs cig/ 'kho lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen pos/ sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyi rgyal mtsho' bying
103a8(mdo): ba dag 'don pa na/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas/ lus la yar me stong bcugs te/ tshig su bcid pa'i tshigs bcang byed thos pa 'di/ rgyal po chen po 'di byams pa dang snying rje gas
103b1(mdo): grub par bya ba'i phyir/ thams cad kyis yi ger bris te/ 'don pa dang kha don tu bya ba dang / dri ba dang / goms par byed pa dang / don yang yid la bya zhing ji ltar btams pa bzhin du nan tan du spyod par bya'o// de'i tshe na myi mang
103b2(mdo): pos de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/ rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur te/ thams cad kyis tshig mthun par rgyal po la stod nas shi nad tu dga'o// rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi snying rje chen po'i pha yang dag pa yin no// 
103b3(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi phyir shi nad tu spyad dka' ba spyod do zhes kun kyis bsngags te shog shog dang dar dang shun pa dang / shing rdo la yi ger bris te/ kha don tu slob po// gang na myi mang po 'du ba'i gnas su yang yi ger bris
103b4(mdo): thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par byas nas/ bla na myed pa 'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go// de'i tshe rgyal po chen pos lu ngas la mar me stong btsugs te/ stond pa chen po bram ze la mchod pa
